metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
List of Kubernetes namespaces to exclude from policy evaluation. Providing a value for this parameter is optional.
How much restriction on users to apply to the cluster

Configure what user ids are valid for pods to use. An empty list means there is no restriction on user ids used. This is defined as a list of objects with a min and a max user id value. E.g. { "ranges": [{"min": 100, "max": 200}] }
